meta.description: Traveling Salesman Problem with specific distance values

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Indices of cities including the starting city

params.name: distance
params.description: Distance between cities i and j

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[i][j] = 1 if the path goes from city i to city j, 0 otherwise

vars.name: u
vars.description: u[i] is a helper variable to eliminate subtours

objective.name: min_total_distance
objective.expr: sum(distance[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i][j] for j in CITIES if i != j)
constraints.description: Each city i must have exactly one outgoing path

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i][j] for i in CITIES if i != j)
constraints.description: Each city j must have exactly one incoming path

constraints.name: subtour_elimination
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities i and j
